title: Alex Jones Show - 2011 Oct 21 FR [sebaygo1]

The Alex Jones Show
Friday, 21 October 2011


[sebaygo1]


Scheduled Guests
................

From the Infowars web site :: 

On the Friday edition of the Alex Jones Show, Alex continues his coverage of al-Qaeda's alleged assassination of Moammar Gaddafi, the deposed Libya leader who was denied a day in court for undocumented crimes against humanity. Alex also covers the latest developments in the economy as the dollar falls against the yen and the Federal Reserve continues to set-up sweetheart deals with ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œtoo big to failÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ mega-banks. Author Naomi Wolf talks with Alex about her recent arrest at the OWS protest in New York. She is the author of Give Me Liberty: A Handbook for American Revolutionaries. Alex talks with regular Friday guest Bob Chapman of the International Forecaster....

Included in this torrent are the two most recent issues of The International Forecaster, obtained via rdubya at ConCen.org.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
